oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph of Lt. Col. John DeWitt Clinton Atkins
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In this photograph, Lt. Col. John DeWitt Clinton Atkins, 5th Tenn. Inf., CSA, from Paris, Tenn. wore his Southern Cross of Honor medal upon the lapel of his suit. Atkins represented the area in the Confederate Congress. He served in the Tennessee House of Representatives and Senate before the war, and the U. S. House of Representatives from 1857-1859 and 1873-1883. He was the Commissioner of Indian Affairs under President Grover Cleveland from 1885-1888.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Atkins, John D. C. (John Dewitt Clinton), 1825-1908
